SEARCH
Package AcademicExchangePlatform.model

Interface Subject

All Known Implementing Classes:
EmailNotificationDecorator, NotificationDecorator, NotificationService, SMSNotificationDecorator
public interface Subject
Interface defining the contract for notification subjects. Part of the Observer pattern implementation. Provides methods for observer management and notification distribution.
